name: Bugtesting Center Application
description:
Welcome to the BUG Testing Center Application!

This game is about dealing with bugs, glitches, and exploits to solve puzzles.

Some bugs are mechanical, some are visual, and some are just random :))

I have got my inspiration from portal-like games, in which you are a robot, and there is a narrator that tells you what to do. Except for the fact that there are no portals. The levels have different puzzles to solve, with some of them easy and others hard.

Some bugs are my imagination, others are inspired from place to place.

The source code can be found on GitHub: https://github.com/TomaAlex-bip/GameOff-2021

I have made the 3D models by myself using Blender.

Some of the sounds are edited by me in Audacity.

The sounds are from:  https://freesound.org/

The textures are from:  https://polyhaven.com/
